content:
The United States State Department has announced new sanctions against Russia.

About thisinformsUS Federal Register.

It is noted that the air space forces of the Russian Federation, Wagner PEC, Russian Pavel Shevelin, Eltechnord, from St. Petersburg and his subsidiaries, a DPRK citizen were restricted.

"The United States accused these persons of violating national legislation on non -proliferation of mass destruction, including nuclear weapons, on Iran, DPRK and Syria," the message reads.

The decision on the application of restrictive measures came into force on February 27.

As reported by the Armyinform, CanadabannedIndirect imports of Russian diamonds.
title: The United States imposes new sanctions against Russia. Under the restriction-Wagner PEC and air space forces of the Russian Federation
